channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Republican Party of Texas sets stage to censure members who stepped out of line in likely bid to block them from primary ballot

item.description: The boat appeared to nearly flip on its side before coming to rest.

item.title: Trial to start on whether deployment of National Guard to Los Angeles violated federal law
item.description: A federal judge in San Francisco will hear arguments on whether military troops deployed this summer by the Trump administration to Los Angeles violat...

item.title: Flooding cancels last day of Wisconsin State Fair, water rescues in Milwaukee
item.description: Heavy rainfall in half a dozen states leads to water rescues, power outages.

item.title: 4 children, 2 adults killed when fire rips through house in Maryland
item.description: Authorities say four children and two adults were killed when fire ripped through a house in Charles County, Maryland

item.title: Tourist who flew to Puerto Rico for Bad Bunny concert was fatally shot, police say
